src:
Bahkan Versi Terbaik Eden Hazard Masih Belum Cukup, Apa yang Salah dengan Real Madrid?
04 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Eden Hazard akhirnya bisa memberikan performa terbaiknya sejak bergabung dengan Real Madrid. Dia tampil luar biasa pada laga kontra Real Betis akhir pekan lalu, tapi Hazard tetap menutup laga dengan rasa frustrasi.
Bermain imbang 0-0 di hadapan publik Santiago Bernabeu memang bukan hasil terbaik yang bisa diberikan skuad Los Blancos. Hasil itu mengecewakan, tapi setidaknya kekecewaan itu terobati dengan performa impresif Hazard.
Menukil Marca, Hazard memang belum benar-benar mencapai level terbaiknya sejak mendarat di Bernabeu. Baru pada laga inilah fans Madrid bisa melihat cuplikan performa terbaik mantan pemain Chelsea itu.
"Setiap pertandingan dia [Hazard] berkembang sedikit lebih baik," kata Zinedine Zidane soal proses perkembangan Hazard. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Even the best version of Eden Hazard is still not enough, what's wrong with Real Madrid?
Nov 04 2019, 10:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Eden Hazard has finally been able to give his best performance since joining Real Madrid. He appeared extraordinary in the match against Real Betis last weekend, but Hazard continued to close the match with frustration.
0-0 draw in public Santiago Bernabeu is indeed not the best result that can be given Los Blancos squad. The results were disappointing, but at least the disappointment was relieved by Hazard's impressive performance.
Menukil Marca, Hazard had not really reached the best level since landing at the Bernabeu. Only in this match Madrid fans can see footage of the former Chelsea's best performance.
"Every game he [Hazard] develops a little better," said Zinedine Zidane about the process of developing Hazard. Read below, Bolaneters!
